Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Salus Smart Home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Salus devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Salus account and discover your devices. 

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

1. Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the Salus app and can be changed

2. Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. 

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

"Alexa, turn on Bedroom light."
"Alexa, set Downstairs temperature to 72 degrees."
